Method Details

trueValues(self, t)

source code 

Get true values of the intended sensed quantity at given times.

Parameters:
  • t - time(s) at which to measure.
Returns:
3xN np.ndarray of true values, where N = len(t).
Overrides: sensors.Sensor.trueValues
